data.title: Company
data.text:
Roland's diverse product range includes electronic musical instruments such as electronic drums, digital pianos, synthesizers, and dance/DJ gear, plus a broad lineup of professional audio/visual and music production equipment. Since our founding in 1972, we have developed a steady stream of world-leading technologies and trendsetting products that have inspired creators and helped define entire musical genres. Driven by our ongoing spirit of innovation, we remain dedicated to introducing new value to the musical instrument and multimedia markets. Roland was one of the first companies to develop the marriage of sound and video, and we continue to expand our business into new areas, including subscription services for software synthesis systems.

Launched in 1976, the BOSS brand is legendary among guitarists, bassists, and other musicians for innovative, great-sounding, and reliable products that enhance and expand their creative experiences. The BOSS range includes effects processors, instrument amplifiers, guitar synthesizers, tuners, wireless systems, and other cutting-edge products that bring value, inspiration, and enjoyment to musicians at every level, from casual hobbyists to touring professionals. The BOSS lineup of compact effect pedals is a music industry staple, with over 100 unique models produced across four-plus decades.

V-MODA produces headphones, earphones, and other mobile audio products that are highly praised by DJs and music fans for their cutting-edge technologies and stylish designs. The brand was founded in the United States in 2004 and joined Roland in 2016. Under the “Creators First” direction, V-MODA continues to create products that deliver excellent sound quality for artists and engineers who work in music production.

Founded in 1972, Drum Workshop, Inc. is widely recognized as the global leader in designing and manufacturing award-winning musical instruments including drums, pedals, hardware and accessories. Drum Workshop manufactures, markets, and distributes an iconic portfolio of brands including DW© Drums and Hardware, PDP®, Latin Percussion®, and Slingerland. Drum Workshop's wide range of products have earned their reputation as The Drummer's Choice and are endorsed by many of the world's top artists. Drum Workshop, Inc., based in the United States, joined Roland in 2022.
